"Meri reunites with <%me>, bringing them up to speed on the situation in Kvaris. Thanks to the ARKS, not just from Aelio, but also from Retem, the investigation of Lost Central is well underway. However, they have not found any clues as to the fate of Rysas. Despite that, she says they have no intention of giving up their search."
